title: Enchanted
content:
Does anyone by any chance know where i can find a similar font as used for the enchanted font as used in the disney? Im trying to create similar text using a similar font!

Any help or advice would be hugely thankful!

Cheers, Si

 [‹ Help with identifying this serif font...](http://web.archive.org/web/20080320023221/http:/typophile.com/node/42875 "Go to previous forum topic") [80's/Retro/Futuristic Type Font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080320023221/http:/typophile.com/node/42866 "Go to next forum topic")
author: simonmc

comments.content: [Here](http://web.archive.org/web/20080320023221/http:/upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/2/2a/Enchantedposter.jpg)’s the poster. I don’t know the font though.

Disney’s titles almost invariably have a degree of customization, and typically feel built from scratch.

You could find quite a few faces in this ballpark at [Letterhead Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20080320023221/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/)

Wow, the typeface formerly known as Manson, inspired by the engravings on tombstones.  
Well, the evil step-mother does look like from a vampire movie...
